description: This header file defines the external API for the Ansc CoVer2 object in the ANSC framework, including function prototypes for creation, deletion, object enrollment, initialization, and synchronization mechanisms such as atomic execution and critical sections.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2Create
methods.description: Creates and initializes an instance of the CoVer2 object with provided context handles.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2Remove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified CoVer2 object instance.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2EnrollObjects
methods.description: Enlists the necessary objects into the CoVer2 instance.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2BeginAtomicExec
methods.description: Begins an atomic execution block within the CoVer2 object.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2EndAtomicExec
methods.description: Ends the current atomic execution block.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2EnterCriticalSection
methods.description: Enters a critical section to ensure thread safety.

methods.name: AnscCoVer2LeaveCriticalSection
methods.description: Leaves the critical section, releasing thread safety guarantees.
